source.name: Colorado Plateau Rapid Ecoregion Assessment Management Question A1: Where are soils susceptable to wind and water erosion?
source.description: This map shows soil factors that may contribute to wind or water erosion, derived from STATSGO and SSURGO soil data and slope information.
